page.title: 16Visitors views cont.
page.content: Only a few people thought the area was so bad it spoilt their stay. At least 95% of the people travelled down by car, and the rest came by train. A few people were staying in a hotel, but the majority were staying in caravans or chalets which were generally clean and big enough. Only the Holimarine chalets were heavily critisied. In the nights just about all the people stayed in the camp or gone to the beach, a few people had gone to Gt.Yarmouth and generally thought it was good. It seems as if Hopton is a family resort and the holiday camps cater for this.Although 50% of the people hadn't met locals, those who had, generally thought they were friendly.
